replies.body: Why did you choose that in game name?
replies.body_tagged: Why did you choose that in game name?

replies.body:
@ Emd

I wanted it to be DaBadger but that was taken. I then tried Something else but that didn't work either. Lastly, I tried DaBadgerMC and it worked. Turns out I forgot the G. Hopefully, the name change update comes out soon so I can change it to TehBedger or TehBdger.
replies.body_tagged:
@ Emd

I wanted it to be DaBadger but that was taken. I then tried Something else but that didn't work either. Lastly, I tried DaBadgerMC and it worked. Turns out I forgot the G. Hopefully, the name change update comes out soon so I can change it to TehBedger or TehBdger.
